test.name: As a user I should be able to set preferred measuring units for multiple devices- Fahrenheit to Celsius independent of the phone’s settings

kw.name: Given : user launches and logs in to the Lumina application
When : user navigates to "Water Card" screen from the "Add New Device Dashboard" screen
And : user sees the wld dashboard
kw.msg: [PASS] Current Temperature of WLD device : 25.5° Temperature Tab 1 of 2

kw.name: And : user navigates to "Settings Option" screen from the "Water Leak Detector" screen
And : user sees the wld dashboard
kw.msg: [PASS] Current Temperature of WLD device : 78° Temperature Tab 1 of 2

kw.name: And : user should see temperature in Celcius

tags.tag: TestName::As a user I should be able to set preferred measuring units for multiple devices- Fahrenheit to Celsius independent of the phone’s settings

TestReportURL::http://atresultserver.honeywell.com:8080/results/Lumina_WLD_BUILD_SamsungS9_Plus_2020_01_29_16_48_05/rebot/report.html#tags?Group::As a user I should be able to set preferred measuring units for multiple devices- Fahrenheit to Celsius independent of the phone’s settings
